resources.string: This app is intended to show you the difference between an app that follow the best practices and other that doesn\'t. \n\nThrough the views you will see an info button on the app bar, there you will have some explanations about what is right or wrong on the screen.
As you can see, there is a lot of empty space after the category names, and even more at the bottom of the screen.
